"A.P.241/4/17/15:30": "...No, Xiera. You can't lose your focus. Don't deny what happened, find out why."
"Why were we so easily infiltrated, and what's the root cause of the management takeover?"
"...?! It shows the controls were taken over by using the master key..."
"It looks like Xiao's data, but... It's not his... A copy of Xiao? No... T-This data is...!"
"This data is... Xion?!"
"You are correct, brethren. Or should I say, grandniece?"
"Now it all makes sense... The uncontrollable copy of Xion made by the Photoners, which was abandoned in subspace..."
"It eventually reached Earth and took on the name \"Mother\"... That explains everything."
"Indeed. No further explanation is required."
"Selfishly creating me, then selfishly abandoning me... They taught my heart what revenge is. Where are the Photoners hiding?"
"You're too late... The Photoners are no longer here. They were destroyed. There is no target for your revenge."
"I see. Then, all that is left is to go and destroy everything the Photoners left behind."
"And in order to obtain the power necessary to do that, I'll need the catalyst for the fusion of Ether and Photons... Aru will be coming with me."
"No, he won't! I'll never hand over Aru!"
"Kyaaa!"
"I won't let you interfere with Mother."
"You're unexpectedly mature, catalyst. You're not going to cry, like people your age do? Or resist me?"
"I believe... I believe that big sis will come to rescue me. So, I won't cry."
"If I cry, big sis will cry. That's why... I absolutely won't cry."
"You're referring to Hitsugi Yasaka? That's useless, she will never awaken."
"That's not true... Big sis... My big sis said she'd protect me!"
"That wish will not come true."
